## Basics

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(trendchart)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_line(sample(1:10), style = "width: 100%")
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_bar(sample(1:10), style = "width:100%;height:10rem;")
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_column(sample(1:10), style = "width: 100%")
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_pie(
  sample(1:3), 
  style = style(
    "--shape-color-1" = "#597BFC",
    "--shape-color-2" = "#e2445c",
    "--shape-color-3" = "#9CD326"
  )
)
```

## Line

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_line(
  sample(1:30), 
  min = 0,
  style = style(
    width = "100%",
    "--area-opacity" = .15
  )
)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_line(
  sample(-15:10), 
  min = 0,
  style = style(
    width = "100%",
    "--area-opacity" = .15,
    "--shape-color" = "#784BD1"
  )
)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_line(
  -sample(1:20), 
  min = 0,
  style = style(
    width = "100%",
    "--area-opacity" = .15,
    "--shape-color" = "#e2445c"
  )
)
```

## Column

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_column(
  sample(1:20), 
  style = style(
    width = "100%",
    "--area-opacity" = .15
  )
)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_column(
  -sample(1:20), 
  style = style(
    width = "100%",
    "--shape-color" = "#e2445c"
  )
)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_column(
  sample(1:30), 
  style = style(
    width = "100%",
    "--shape-gap" = 0
  )
)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
trend_column(
  sample(1:20), 
  `shape-radius` = 10,
  style = style(
    width = "100%"
  )
)
```

## Advanced

```{r, results = 'asis'}
htmltools::div(
  style = "background-color:#7346d3;border-radius:1rem;color:white;",
  htmltools::div(
    style = "padding:1rem;",
    htmltools::h4(415),
    htmltools::p("Number of views (30 days)"),
  ),
  trend_line(
    sample(1:20), 
    min = 0L,
    style = style(
      width = "100%",
      "--shape-opacity" = .15,
      "--shape-color" = "#fff"
    )
  )
)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
htmltools::div(
  style = "background-color:#0376EE;border-radius:1rem;color:white;text-align:center;",
  htmltools::div(
    style = "padding:1rem;",
    htmltools::h4(415),
    htmltools::p("Number of views (30 days)"),
  ),
  trend_column(
    sample(1:15), 
    min = 0,
    style = style(
      width = "100%",
      height = "7rem",
      "--shape-opacity" = .15,
      "--shape-color" = "#fff"
    )
  )
)
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
htmltools::div(
  style = "position:relative;width:5rem",
  trend_pie(
    75,
    min = 0,
    max = 100,
    `shape-size` = 6,
    style = style(
      "--shape-color" = "#F17A33"
    )
  ),
  htmltools::tags$i(
    class = "fa fa-user",
    style = "position:absolute;top:30%;left:30%;width:40%;color:#F17A33;"
  )
)
```
